feed.title: Madhavan Lab
feed.subtitle: Studyin Quantum Materials with STM and MBE

entry.title: Congratulations Davide!
entry.content: Congratulations to Davide Iaia on completing his PhD Defense, Scanning Tunneling Microscopy and Spectroscopy Study of Phase Transition and Topology in Layered Transition Metal Dichalcogenides!
entry.summary: Congratulations to Davide Iaia on completing his PhD Defense, Scanning Tunneling Microscopy and Spectroscopy Study of Phase Transition and Topology in Layered Transition Metal Dichalcogenides!

entry.title: Anuva is a PPG-MRL Fellow!
entry.content: Anuva Aishwarya has won a PPG-MRL Fellowship for the 2020-2021 academic year; congratulations to Anuva!
entry.summary: Anuva Aishwarya has won a PPG-MRL Fellowship for the 2020-2021 academic year; congratulations to Anuva!

entry.title: Lab Members Win Awards!
entry.content: Guannan Chen has won the Scott Anderson Outstanding Graduate Assistant Award for 2020 from the UIUC Dept. of Physics; congratulations, Guannan! Undergraduates Zhuozhen Cai and Will Jing have also received Summer 2020 research awards. Zhuozhen received a 2020 Lorella M. Jones Undergraduate Summer Research Award and LAS James Scholar Preble Research Fellowship; Will was awarded a Research Support Grant (RSG) sponsored by the Office of Undergraduate Research (OUR)!
entry.summary: Guannan Chen has won the Scott Anderson Outstanding Graduate Assistant Award for 2020 from the UIUC Dept. of Physics; congratulations, Guannan! Undergraduates Zhuozhen Cai and Will Jing have also received Summer 2020 research awards. Zhuozhen received a 2020 Lorella M. Jones Undergraduate Summer Research Award and LAS James Scholar Preble Research Fellowship; Will was awarded a Research Support Grant (RSG) sponsored by the Office of Undergraduate Research (OUR)!

entry.title: Rachel Wins NDSEG Fellowship!
entry.content: Congratulations to Rachel Birchmier on receiving a prestigious NDSEG Fellowship from the US Department of Defense for 2020! This 3-year Fellowship will support Rachel’s PhD research.
entry.summary: Congratulations to Rachel Birchmier on receiving a prestigious NDSEG Fellowship from the US Department of Defense for 2020! This 3-year Fellowship will support Rachel’s PhD research.

entry.title: Congratulations Sean!
entry.content: Congratulations to Sean Howard on his PhD Defense, Scanning Tunneling Microscopy Studies of a Tunable Topological Insulator and Magnetic Weyl Semimetal! Sean will be joining the Johns Hopkins University Applied Physics Laboratory as a Senior Staff Scientist in Summer 2020. All the best, Sean!
entry.summary: Congratulations to Sean Howard on his PhD Defense, Scanning Tunneling Microscopy Studies of a Tunable Topological Insulator and Magnetic Weyl Semimetal! Sean will be joining the Johns Hopkins University Applied Physics Laboratory as a Senior Staff Scientist in Summer 2020. All the best, Sean!

entry.title: Congratulations Yulia!
entry.content: Congratulations to Yulia Maximenko on successfully completing her PhD Defense! Yulia will be moving on to become a Postdoctoral Fellow at the National Institute of Standards and Technology, Center for Nanoscale Science and Technology in Maryland and will be working with Dr. Joseph A. Stroscio. Best wishes, Yulia!
entry.summary: Congratulations to Yulia Maximenko on successfully completing her PhD Defense! Yulia will be moving on to become a Postdoctoral Fellow at the National Institute of Standards and Technology, Center for Nanoscale Science and Technology in Maryland and will be working with Dr. Joseph A. Stroscio. Best wishes, Yulia!

entry.title: Best Wishes to Zhenyu!
entry.content: After four years in Madhavan Group, Zhenyu Wang is now headed to a position at University of Science and Technology of China - Hefei. His work ethic, guidance, and personality will be missed by all. We wish him and his family the best as they start a new chapter in China! Come back and visit soon!
entry.summary: After four years in Madhavan Group, Zhenyu Wang is now headed to a position at University of Science and Technology of China - Hefei. His work ethic, guidance, and personality will be missed by all. We wish him and his family the best as they start a new chapter in China! Come back and visit soon!

entry.title: Congratulations to Davide and Anuva
entry.content:
Graduate students Davide Iaia and Anuva Aishwarya have both been recognized with awards by the Department of Physics!

Davide has won the Renato Bobone Award! It recognizes academic excellence of international students, with a preference towards Italian citizens. Nice job Davide!

Anuva has been awarded the Scott Anderson Award! It recognizes outstanding achievement of a teaching or research assistant. Way to go Anuva!
entry.summary: Graduate students Davide Iaia and Anuva Aishwarya have both been recognized with awards by the Department of Physics! Davide has won the Renato Bobone Award! It recognizes academic excellence of international students, with a preference towards Italian citizens. Nice job Davide! Anuva has been awarded the Scott Anderson Award! It recognizes outstanding achievement of a teaching or research assistant. Way to go Anuva!

entry.title: Good Luck Somesh!
entry.content: Somesh Ganguli is accepting a new position as a Postdoc at Aalto University in Finland! We wish him the best of luck with this new opportunity. You will be missed Somesh!
entry.summary: Somesh Ganguli is accepting a new position as a Postdoc at Aalto University in Finland! We wish him the best of luck with this new opportunity. You will be missed Somesh!

entry.title: Center for Integrated Quantum Materials
entry.content: Check out this talk at The Center for Integrated Quantum Materials! This talk discuss the interplay of Charge Density Waves (CDWs), domain walls, and superconductivity.
entry.summary: Check out this talk at The Center for Integrated Quantum Materials! This talk discuss the interplay of Charge Density Waves (CDWs), domain walls, and superconductivity.
